channel.title: Err help!

item.title: Err help!
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

ok well im trying to make a wannetalk and i got thisâ€¦

case 50: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("My Addy PickAxe I Lost It Please Help Me!", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 51: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Sure I Guess!", 2461); sendFrame126("No, Im too Busy", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 52: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Well,This Is what Happened I went to ardy and tripped",4885); sendFrame126("and i think it fell in a well find it there?", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 53: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Fine", 4885); sendFrame126("Thanks Anyway", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

but when i talk to him i only get case 50 not 51-53 help please!

Read full topic
